name: Deepurr and Deepurr
description:
** Run at 1920x1080 only **

This game was created for Ludum Game Jam 48. Theme: Deeper and Deeper.

Two cats.In space.Are going deeper and deeper into the void in search of yarn.

Make it to the wormholes with the most yarn that matches your cats' helmet. 

Sometimes they trade colors, so watch out for that.

This game uses 2 Xbox One controllers. The combined input of the players joysticks determine the players movement and rotation.

Controls:

  • Left joystick: Thrust
  • Right Joystick: Rotation
  • Menu Button: Pause
  • A: Deploy Weapuns
  • Right Trigger (both at the same time): Warp to a random location

Have Fun!

(Only play with a friend you are willing to lose. The game can get hairy.)
